attributes.action: Inject cash into the right vein - stop using methodone and send heroin users to a detox clinic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are approx 39000 heroin users in England, Scotland & Wales.  
Over £800million a year is spent on the addiction services, who pass users around from GP's to nurses for check ups and medicals and seeing their drug counsellors for assessments only to be put on medication such as methadone or subutex for many years which does very little in actually dealing with the drug problem.

A detox clinic costs approx £3000 for one patient, which would cost £117million for all heroin addicts to become 'clean'. 
That's alot less money than the useles system we have now.
Stop wasting money on methodone for them to sell to buy heroin.
Stamp out the heroin and crime rates will drop.  The majority of drug related crime is to do with heroin users stealing to get their 'fix' or abusing people when they cant get their 'fix'
